xpath.span: Please return form and parts to:

span.p:
Burr Oak Tool Inc.
Attn: Warranty Specialist

xpath.p:
Burr Oak Tool Inc.
Attn: Warranty Specialist
239 E. Bogen Rd
Sturgis, MI 49091

xpath.td:
1. Authorization for returns is signified with a Return Goods Authorization (RGA) form
2. Items must be returned within 30 days of authorization
3. Restocking fees may be charged
4. Products shipped back to Burr Oak Tool must be clearly marked with the BOT assigned case number and a copy of this RGA
5. Returns must be sent via prepaid transportation
6. International customers please note on your commercial invoice "U.S. Goods Being Returned"

1. Authorization for returns is signified with a Return Goods Authorization (RGA) form
2. Items must be returned within 30 days of authorization

5. Returns must be sent via prepaid transportation
6. International customers please note on your commercial invoice "U.S. Goods Being Returned"
